channel.title: Posts | Mark Fransham | spatial inequality and social policy

item.title: Combining pdf documents with LaTeX
item.description:
Here’s how to do it.

\documentclass{report}
\usepackage{pdfpages}
\pdfminorversion=7

\begin{document}

\includepdf[pages=1-]{2020 07 13 Kidlington CC Covid-19 precautions for matches and training sessions.pdf}

\includepdf[pages=1-]{2020 07 13 ECB Clubhouse Action Checklist.pdf}

\includepdf[pages=1-, landscape=true]{2020 07 13 ECB Clubhouse Risk Assessment.pdf}

\end{document}
